name: Swingcopter Flip
description: Flips the player's visuals upside down when gravity is reversed in swingcopter mode. Makes it easier to keep track of what your gravity is.

mod-enabled.name: Enabled
mod-enabled.description: Whether or not the mod is enabled. Turning this off will remove the flipping.

title-flip-animation.name: Flip Animation
title-flip-animation.description: Controls the rotation that happens when you flip directions.

rotation-intensity.name: Rotation Intensity
rotation-intensity.description: Changes how noticable the rotation is when you flip directions.

rotation-duration.name: Rotation Duration
rotation-duration.description: Changes how long the rotation lasts when you flip directions.
